titles.title: A bill to authorize the International Boundary and Water Commission to reimburse State and local governments for expenses incurred by such governments in designing, constructing, and rehabilitating the Lower Rio Grande Valley Flood Control Project.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 4/9/2008--Introduced. Authorizes the International Boundary and Water Commission to reimburse state and local governments for expenses incurred in designing, constructing, and rehabilitating the Lower Rio Grande Valley Flood Control Project.
